item.description: We'll be meeting at a member's house in the north Deering neighborhood of Portland (I'll send address to the "yes" and "maybe" rsvp'ers as we get closer to the date). There is plenty of onstreet parking. We'll gather at 6:30 p.m. and then watch a Law of Attraction video at 7pm (thank you Sue and Michele!), followed by discussion. It'll be an "unplanned" potluck, so please bring whatever food and beverage you feel inspired to bring! Hope to see you all there.
item.name: Portland Law of Attraction Connection
